data.chText: 精明的；敏锐的；有眼光的；精于盘算的
data.enText: clever at understanding and making judgements about a situation
She is a shrewd judge of character.
showing good judgement and likely to be right

data.chText: 这个神秘的来访者是谁，我能猜个八九不离十。
data.enText: I have a shrewd idea who the mystery caller was.

ex.chText: 你的儿子很机灵，一定会很有前途。
ex.enText: Your son is smart, so he'll do well in life.

ex.chText: 博比很有头脑，他会迫不及待地接受这个机会的。
ex.enText: Bobby is so smart that he will jump at this opportunity.

synonyms.bx: 指头脑敏捷、精明老练的，强调思维能力很强，办事巧妙，能圆滑地处理人际关系等。

ex.chText: 他是个特别聪明的小伙子。
ex.enText: He is an exceptionally bright boy.

ex.chText: 我的一些学生非常聪明。
ex.enText: Some of my students are very bright.

synonyms.bx: 通常指年轻人或小孩聪明机灵的，强调思维敏捷、反应迅速。

ex.enText: A clever woman can't make a meal without rice.

ex.chText: 聪明的狐狸逃脱了猎人的追踪。
ex.enText: The clever fox escaped the hunter.

ex.chText: 他很聪明，半分钟就找到了答案。
ex.enText: He was clever to arrive at the answer in half a minute.

synonyms.bx: 指学习和理解能力强的，强调机敏、能干。

ex.chText: 他原来是个和你一样聪明的孩子。
ex.enText: He was as intelligent a child as ever you were.

ex.chText: 事实上，所谓女性没有男性聪明的说法是对性别的偏见。
ex.enText: In fact, it is sexist to say that women are less intelligent than men.

synonyms.bx: 指才智过人、善于作出正确判断的，强调思维清楚、理解力强。

ex.chText: 我的老板是个精明的生意人。
ex.enText: My boss is a shrewd businessman.

ex.chText: 一个精明的人懂得什么能说，什么不能说。
ex.enText: A shrewd man knows what he can say and what he can't.

synonyms.bx: 指善于判断情况或洞察他人心思的。

ex.enText: No man is wise at all times.

ex.chText: 他们作出了一个明智的决定。
ex.enText: They have made a wise decision.
It is wise to keep out of debt.

synonyms.bx: 指决定或行动是明智的；也指人因阅历丰富而有智慧及谋略的，强调有判断力，能明辨是非。

example: an astute tenant always reads the small print in a lease
he was too shrewd to go along with them on a road that could lead only to their overthrow
the most calculating and selfish men in the community

value.def: A shrewd person is able to understand and judge a situation quickly and to use this understanding to their own advantage.

example.ex: His grey eyes were shrewd but kindly...
example.tran: 他灰色的眼睛目光锐利却很亲切。

example.ex: It should prove a shrewd investment.
example.tran: 这将是一项精明的投资。

value.tran: 精明的;敏锐的;有眼光的;精于盘算的

example.ex: His natural shrewdness tells him what is needed to succeed.
example.tran: 他与生俱来的精明告诉他成功所需要的一切。
